name: ElementalCave
description: ElementalCave is a game created for the TUM SemesterGamesJam SS 2020 under the topic "Modification". It is a simple one-button game which is played only by using the Space key. First you start by guiding your character through a world that has a element which is randomly chosen. Simple start but it gets harder: after a while you get challenged by the world itself - the world's element suddenly gets rechosen so you need modify your own element accordingly. If you don't act right or are too slow - you're lost.
